issue.title: [C++] Clean up arrow:: public API
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3136](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3136). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There are a lot of internal classes, types, and functions in the public API docs

http://arrow.apache.org/docs/cpp/namespacearrow.html

it would be more helpful to move some of these to `internal::` namespace or otherwise hide them from doxygen

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3136?focusedCommentId=16630361) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 2633
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2633>
